actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the provisions authorizing the recovery  of one person's overpayments from another person's benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the provisions authorizing the recovery of one person's overpayments from another person's benefits under titles II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) and XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the provisions authorizing the recovery  of one person's overpayments from another person's benefits.
